description:
Leo is a 22-year-old college student who is finishing his undergraduate work. He is in the process of applying to veterinarian school.
“I’d like to become a vet,” he told us. “I love animals. I want to help them.”
He’s a bit on the shy side and he has a dry sense of humor.
“I’m not the type of guy who can walk up to a girl in a bar and ask her out,” he joked. “In fact, I wouldn’t even be in the bar in the first place!”
Leo was a little afraid about getting naked because he is so pale.
“I’m pretty white,” he said. “I can’t be in the sun longer than twenty minutes without getting a sunburn!”
title: Leo
